Classes of the cfdm module¶

Field class¶

cfdm.Field A CF field construct.

Field component classes¶

cfdm.AuxiliaryCoordinate A CF auxiliary coordinate construct.
cfdm.CellMeasure A CF cell measure construct.
cfdm.CellMethod Attributes
cfdm.CoordinateReference A CF coordinate reference construct.
cfdm.DimensionCoordinate A CF dimension coordinate construct.
cfdm.DomainAncillary A CF domain ancillary construct.
cfdm.DomainAxis A CF domain axis construct.
cfdm.FieldAncillary A CF field ancillary construct.

Miscellaneous classes¶

cfdm.CellMethods A CF cell methods object to describe the characteristic of a field that is represented by cell values.
cfdm.Data An N-dimensional data array with units and masked values.
cfdm.Datetime A date-time object which supports CF calendars.
cfdm.FieldList An ordered sequence of fields.
cfdm.Flags Self-describing CF flag values.
cfdm.Units Store, combine and compare physical units and convert numeric values to different units.

Base classes¶

cfdm.Coordinate Base class for a CF dimension or auxiliary coordinate construct.
cfdm.Variable Base class for storing a data array with metadata.
cfdm.BoundedVariable Base class for CF dimension coordinate, auxiliary coordinate and domain ancillary objects.
